# Windows 平台下的堆溢出、格式化字符串漏洞利用技术

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/windows-pingtai-xia-de-dui-yichu-geshihua-zifuchuan-loudong-liyong-jishu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/windows-pingtai-xia-de-dui-yichu-geshihua-zifuchuan-loudong-liyong-jishu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install windows-pingtai-xia-de-dui-yichu-geshihua-zifuchuan-loudong-liyong-jishu
windows-pingtai-xia-de-dui-yichu-geshihua-zifuchuan-loudong-liyong-jishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g windows-pingtai-xia-de-dui-yichu-geshihua-zifuchuan-loudong-liyong-jishu
windows-pingtai-xia-de-dui-yichu-geshihua-zifuchuan-loudong-liyong-jishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
